title: Rad Bazaar Alert: Hufnagel Porteur
content:
Just a few weeks ago, we shared the news that Jordan Hufnagel was making skewers again. That must have sent some resonance waves across the Radaverse, prompting Earl Mikesell to list his 2012 Hufnagel Porteur on the Rad Bazaar for $3350.

“Kinda legendary bike arounds these parts… Constructeur style city bike built around center pull brakes and 650b x 42 tires. Original build spec from 2012 has been maintained including all the original hand-built parts (fillet brazed frame, stem with bell mount, front rack, rear light, skewers, chain keeper…). “

 

Check out the full listing with more information and photos at the Rad Bazaar and see some stunning Hufnagel bikes in our Related Archives below!
